description: They're rumoured to be dating following Kylie Jenner's recent split from Tyga in April.
title: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott look cosy at NBA game
title_page: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott look cosy at NBA game | Daily Mail Online
text:
They're rumoured to be dating following Kylie Jenner's recent split from Tyga in April.
And the reality star and rumoured new love interest and rapper Travis Scott were pictured for the first time at an NBA game in Houston, Texas, on Tuesday, where they looked rather cosy.
The pair sat courtside during Game Five of the Western Conference Quarterfinals game of the 2017 NBA Playoffs at Toyota Center.
Scroll down for video
It's Scott to be the real deal! Kylie Jenner and rumoured new love interest Travis looked very cosy as they were pictured together for the first time at NBA game
Kylie, 19, had dressed down for the occasion, wearing a rust-coloured baggy T-shirt which loose-fitting ripped jeans and black trainers.
Her poker straight raven locks hung down past her shoulders as she made a very public appearance with Travis.
24-year-old Travis, meanwhile, clashed his prints, wearing a plaid shirt with camo trousers, teamed with powder blue Nike trainers.
Nice seats: The pair sat courtside during Game Five of the Western Conference Quarterfinals game of the 2017 NBA Playoffs at Toyota Center following Travis' performance
Low-key: Kylie, 19, had dressed down for the occasion, wearing a rust-coloured baggy T-shirt which loose-fitting ripped jeans and black trainers
Kylie supported Travis at the sporting event, where he performed before play-off.
A source told People, 'During his performance, Kylie was hiding in the Rockets’ courtside club anxiously waiting for him to come back to her.
'Once he got back, they definitely looked like a couple, cuddled up next to each other among her friends.
Gone their separate ways? Kylie and long-term love Tyga are said to have split back in April
'They were super hand-holdy and it seemed like she wanted people to see them together. They haven’t let go of each other since he got off the court.'
MailOnline has contacted a spokesperson for both Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott for comment.
Meanwhile, US Weekly reported that Tyga has already left Kylie's $6 million mansion in Hidden Hills, California.
He and Scott Disick partied together at the TAG Heuer unveiling of Amgen Tour of California Best Young Rider Jersey with Brand Ambassador at Galerie Montaigne on Tuesday night.
